channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danny and Mick
channel.desc: Lady Fortesque has lost her diamond ring and Joy is in a panic. She tasks Danny and Mick with searching the leisure centre. Luckily Mick is head of security and he stumbles across the ring in the caf?. Problem solved, Joy heads off to call Lady Fortesque who comes to collect her ring with a reporter from the newspaper. Unfortunately Mick has lost the ring again. Can Danny make his way through the soft play to get the ring back.
